definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: Ask your student-loan servicer to extend your payback period.
sentences.chinese: 請求你的學生貸款商延長你的還款期限。

sentences.english: I had borrowed 500,000 yuan, and the term was 25 years.
sentences.chinese: 我當初借了銀行50萬元，還款期是25年。

sentences.english: Second bestare charge cards that require payment in full each month.
sentences.chinese: 第二個最佳選擇是每個月需要全額還款的簽帳卡。

sentences.english: It is a very large payment at the end of the repayment period.
sentences.chinese: 它是一個非常龐大的金額，在年底前的還款期。

sentences.english: You can save money on your loans by consolidating them and locking in a lower interest rate.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通過合併還款的方式把利律降低，以節省金錢。

sentences.english: Some structured it as a loan and deferred repayment.
sentences.chinese: 一些人把它作爲一筆貸款和延期還款。

sentences.english: In exchange the city pays the bank a fixed rate.
sentences.chinese: 於是交易時，市政府按固定利率給銀行還款。

sentences.english: So we convince these distributors to give us the parts on next 30 days credit.
sentences.chinese: 我們說服批發商賒給我們零件，30天后還款。

sentences.english: He'd negotiate a truce a repayment plan a job search.
sentences.chinese: 他們協商出一個還款協議，還要給老石找份工作。

sentences.english: Eventually the Freemans proved they could keep up with the payments.
sentences.chinese: 最終弗里曼一家證明自己可以繼續完成還款。

sentences.english: It can take several months before payment missteps actually drive down a credit score.
sentences.chinese: 數個月前未能還款才真正使信用積分下降。

sentences.english: Wasn't some how many loan purchasing homes interrupt repayments , still actually explicit at present.
sentences.chinese: 究竟有多少貸款買房者中斷還款，目前尚不明確。

sentences.english: It is an opportunity to develop good repayment habits and budgeting skills.
sentences.chinese: 這也是培養良好的還款習慣與預算技巧的機會。

sentences.english: That'll be enough, and the repayment period sounds good to me.
sentences.chinese: 足夠了，而且對我來說，還款期聽起來不錯。

sentences.english: Use this information to formulate a pay-back strategy.
sentences.chinese: 並使用這些信息來規劃你還款的策略。

sentences.english: Mr. Atkins said that was the result of fewer mortgage prepayments .
sentences.chinese: 阿特金斯表示，這是抵押貸款提前還款減少的結果。

definition: to borrow or lend money/debit and credit items on a balance sheet
a loan/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/to provide a loan (e.g. bank)/to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
to demand payment of money owing
to return (sth borrowed etc)/to send back/to refund/to rebate
